meanings.definition: A substance used in radioallergosorbent testing.
meanings.sent1: The doctor ordered a radioallergosorbent to determine my allergies.
meanings.sent2: The radioallergosorbent revealed that I am allergic to pollen.
meanings.sent3: I never thought a tiny radioallergosorbent could tell me so much about my health!
meanings.sent4: The radioallergosorbent acted like a detective, uncovering my hidden allergies.
meanings.sent5: The radioallergosorbent test was like a magic potion, revealing the secrets of my immune system.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a test that uses radioallergosorbent.
meanings.sent1: The radioallergosorbent results confirmed my suspicion of being allergic to cats.
meanings.sent2: The radioallergosorbent procedure was quick and painless.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see how the radioallergosorbent test made me sneeze uncontrollably!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with relief when the radioallergosorbent results came back negative.
meanings.sent5: The radioallergosorbent equipment hummed softly as it analyzed my blood sample.
